forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 22C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 72F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
